name: FISH GUIDANCE SYSTEMS, LTD.
description: Behavioral deflection and acoustic fish control systems.
sampleDescriptions: Assist client with government relations directed to use of fish guidance systems as a deterrent to invasive carp in inland waterways.
Assist client with issues related to invasive fish species and efforts to deter the spread of those invasive fish species into inland waterways.
